original_text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him; and they feared the people: for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them.
korean_text: 서기관들과 대제사장들이 예수의 이 비유는 자기들을 가리켜 말씀하심인 줄 알고 즉시 잡고자 하되 백성을 두려워하더라

sentences.original_text: same hour sought to lay hands on him
sentences.korean_translation: 바로 그 시간에 그를 잡으려고 했다

sentences.original_text: that he had spoken this parable against them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 향해 이 비유를 말했다는 것을
